readable.title: 2201222219_8d656b0633
readable.content: A boy is sitting on a brightly colored chair next to a child 's book playing a guitar . A toddler is sitting on a red checked chair whilst playing a guitar . A young child is sitting in a colorful chair with a guitar in his hands and a book sitting next to him . A young child playing guitar on the chair Young barefoot boy playing a guitar setting in a large muti colored chair with a picture of three pigs beside him .
